summary:
Skryim Redesigned. 

From the author of Dragon Age Redesigned, Fallout New Vegas Redesigned 2 and Fallout 3 Redesigned.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dwaZt.jpg[/IMG]

Skyrim is a beautiful game but it has many inconsistencies with respect to textures. Some are intricate, detailed and meticulous. While others are not. I\'m playing the game and changing textures and things which I personally wanted to change. 

This mod is set up so that you can keep or remove sections to allow customization. Each folder contains a description and an image of the changes so that you can see if it something you wish to install. 

Due to the fact that I would like to give full customization to the end-user, this mod will be in a folder set as opposed to an NMM version. 
 
Here are other redesign projects for other games I have modded:

[url=http://dragonage.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=686] Dragon Age Redesigned[/url]
[url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=39218] Fallout New Vegas Redesigned (recently updated) [/url]
[url=http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6341] Fallout 3 Project Beauty HD (Fallout 3 Redesigned)[/url]
author: Dracomies
